about_the_game:
The Forgotten Village of Gondomayit lets you experience the mystical atmosphere of Indonesia.
Tells the story of a young man named Bagas, a vocational school student
who lost the bet and received a challenge from his friends. He had to test his courage in one of the boarding houses in Gondomayit Village, which had long been abandoned by the residents after the eruption of Mount Merapi. However, many strange things happened when they first arrived at the village. Starting from a scary and lonely atmosphere,
the appearance of strange creatures, full of puzzles and much more.
And this game is also very interactive because there are missions that must be completed, starting from looking for clues as to why the boarding house is so haunted.
Designed and developed from the ground up for fully immersive atmosphere and gameplay,
The Forgotten Village of Gondomayit is our approach to a truly unsettling and terrifying experience.
